The chart used to rank the intelligence: which was based on a 2006 study conducted by psychologist Dean Keith Simonton from the University of California, Davis.
The historiometric approach employed by: academic honors, college admissions exam scores, occupation, and preferences.
The compilation of Simonton: s research into a chart for a 2015 article published by US News, which did not include President Barack Obama due to the data being compiled before he took office.
The claim that Donald Trump has an IQ of: which originated from an estimation made in an article published by BeforeItsNews.com in 2015, based on Trump's education and the requirements for admission to the Wharton School.
